pages.text: Inene Thina Sammisela eMhlabeni, Samnika indlela yezinto zonke
Ke kaloku yena wayelandela iNdlela yeThu

Kwada kwalilixa apho wafikelela ekutshoneni kwelanga, walifumana litshona, kulwandle lwamanzi anodaka olumnyama. Wafumana ecaleni kwawo abantu. Thina Sathi: “Hini na Dthul’Karnayn! Ungabohlwaya okanye ubaphathe kakuhle ngezibele, (kukuwe).”
Wathiyena:“Lowo(ungakholwayokuAllâh) enzeubugwenxa, siya kumohlwaya, yaye uya kubuyiselwa eNkosini yakhe, Eza kumohlwaya ngesohlwayo esibi Kunene (isiHogo)
Ke lowo ukholwayo (kuAllâh) enze izenzo zobulungisa, uya kufumana owona mvuzo mhle (iPaladesi) yaye thina siya kuthetha naye amazwi amnandi.”
Kwada kwalilixa apho wafikelela kwindawo yokuphuma kwelanga, walifumana liphuma ebantwini Thina esingabanikanga sikhuseli ngokuchasene nelanga
Ngoko ke (kwabanjalo) yaye SaSisazi konke ngaye (uDthul’Karnayn)

Kwada kwalilixa apho wafikelela phakathi kweentaba ezimbini, wafumana phambi kwazo (ezo ntaba ezimbini), abantu ekwakunzima ukuba babe nelizwi nokuba libe linye abaliqondayo (ekungekho ntetho bayaziyo)
Bathi: “O Dthul‘Karnayn! Inene uYa’jûj (uGogi) noMa’jûj (uMagogi), ngabenzi bokungcola (abakhulu) emhlabeni. Ingaba singakunika na intlawulo yokuba wenze umsantsa phakathi kwethu nabo?”

Wathi yena, “Oko iNkosi yam Indimisele kona kungcono (kunoko nindinika kona nina), kodwa ke nina ndincediseni ngamandla (ndinikeni abantu bokundincedisa); mna ndiya kwenza idama phakathi kwenu nabo (uYa’jûj noMa’jûj)

Ndinikeni amacangci entsimbi;” wathi ke esakugqiba, ukuwandlala tyaba phakathi kweentaba ezimbini, wathi: “Vuthelani;” uthe ke esakuwenza ada aba ngumlilo, wathi: “Ndiziseleni ikopolo enyityilikisiweyo ndiyigalele phezu kwawo.”
Baza ke ngoko (uYa’jûj noMa’jûj) abakwazi ukugqitha kuwo abakwazi nokugrumba bagqobhozele kuwo
